entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question about obsolete Assembly.CodeBase and confusion about Assembly.Location alternative #83997
  • [perf] RSA is significantly slower than RSACryptoServiceProvider when verifying data #83994
  • How to tell if a connect timeout is caused by caller or callee? #83993
  • [cecil] TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #83991
  • [API Proposal]: Add "poll" object #83989
  • [API Proposal] Add persist able AssemblyBuilder implementation #83988
    8.0.0
  • CI failure STRICT_JS doesn't work with MODULARIZE or EXPORT_ES6 #83986
  • Windbg Can't Unwind Stacks for Single-File Dumps Captured with procdump #83985
    8.0.0
  • MacOS save/restore for AVX-512 state #83983
  • Usage of TargetArchitecture in managed coreclr test #83980
  • About. net6 executable files on window os #83977
  • [mono] Implement cuckoo filter for attribute retrieval #83974
    Future
  • [mono][aot] Further optimizations for dedup improvement #83973
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Int128 IPAddress.GetAddress() #83971
  • Blazor Crashes in AOT mode When Referencing SkiaSharp (Regression in NET8-preview.2) #83970
  • [CoreCLR Linux arm32] `ICorDebugStackWalk` works wrong in case top frame is native. #83967
    8.0.0
  • [GC] GetLogicalProcessorCacheSizeFromOS should fallback per cache level #83964
  • [libraries-jitstress-random] Assertion failed '(emitThisGCrefRegs & regMask) == 0' during 'Emit code' #83963
    8.0.0
  • [jitstress-random] Failure in profiler/handles/handles/handles #83962
    8.0.0
  • Test merged baseservices/threading time out in gcstress #83961
    8.0.0
  • [pgostress] fullpgo_random_gdv_edge failures in JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988/GitHub_65988 #83960
    8.0.0
  • [jitosr_stress_random] Failures in System.Text related tests #83959
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Reflection Returns Incorrect Results when getting private properties on Derived Classes #83979
  • [ARM64] Performance regression: Utf8Encoding #41699
    8.0.0
  • DirectorySearcher.DirectorySynchronization Cookie is not updated in .net core #83978
  • Platform_TimeZoneNames failing for Iran time zones on macOS #83901
    Future
  • Update Linux/Mac Context State for AVX512 #81846
    8.0.0
  • Confusing error message. #83667
    Future
  • when I send data with Guid.Empty, the validator success validation instead of fail validation. #83954
  • [ARM64] Consider using LDAPR for volatile variables #83830
  • net7/net8 run on arm9 or arm11 #83975
  • String Comparation Globalization Not Working in Blazor WebAssembly #66899
    8.0.0
  • Blazor WASM CurrentInfo DateTimeFormat GetMonthName doesn't return the correct result .NET 5 #57723
    Future
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #79306
    8.0.0
  • Support more formats in json TimeOnlyConverter #83863
  • LINQ Array Performance #83871
  • [browser][icu] Enable custom ICU loading for Blazor #83585
  • TFM trimming, and elimination of net4* targeting in Linux source-build #74950
    8.0.0
  • Type initializer call ordering w.r.t. static field stores does not look right #72354
    8.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] System.Numerics.Vectors.Tests fails in Debug build #77836
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Text.RegularExpressions.Tests.Perf_Regex_Industry_RustLang_Sherlock #71070
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: Regressions in System.Numerics.Tests.Perf_Plane #75686
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in PerfLabTests.CastingPerf #79305
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 5 Regressions on 1/13/2023 3:30:06 PM #80862
    8.0.0
  • [Perf] Windows/x64: Regressions after enabling constant folding in Tier0 #82909
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Update nullable annotations on `JsonSerializer.Serialize<TValue>` #83930
  • System.Runtime.Intrinsics.Tests crashing on Linux x64 #83917

PullRequests

Created

  • Add osx-arm64 for coreclr packages. #84001
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • JIT: small OSR locals must be normalize on load #84000
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Bump emscripten to 3.1.34 #83998
    area-Build-mono
  • Set minimum language version allowed by config binding generator #83996
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Potential fix for #6924 #83995
    needs-area-label
  • Enable regex source gen / compiler vectorization of all sets #83992
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Expose helper APIS for GetLower/Upper and WithLower/Upper #83982
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • OSDescription.Linux: return a user-friendly name based on /etc/os-release. #83976
    community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • JIT: Allow forward substituting small-typed nodes #83969
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix profiler handle GC test #83968
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83966
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Use CLOCK_BOOTTIME to calculate BootTime on linux (#67589) #83965
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Diagnostics.Process, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Fix reserving executable memory as per allocation type in ClrVirtualAllocWithinRange() #83958
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-coreclr, 7.0.x
  • [release/7.0] [wasm] ManagedToNativeGenerator: Skip unmanaged dlls #83957
    Servicing-consider, arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 7.0.x
  • Always create loop pre header #83956
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • Fix function pointer as fields inspection #83981
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Add ability specify core_root when run #82387
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Switch the channel from 8.0 to 8.0-preview #83984
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • update types mentioned in comment to match method #82768
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • add link to interop guidelines #83987
    area-Meta
  • Modernize XmlUTF8TextWriter with u8/inline out's. #75812
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Fix Iran time zone test case #83952
    area-System.DateTime, 8.0.0
  • Update the hardcoded dotnet-version with channels #83905
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Updating Unix to save/restore Avx512 state #83784
    area-PAL-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Issue 83667 #83820
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Documentation for loading custom files in Blazor. #83925
    documentation, arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [wasm] Add PackedSimd bit shift intrinsics #83896
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Implement checking for Requires* on attributes for NativeAOT #83550
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #83899
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • JIT: Fix ordering of type initialization and stsfld #80485
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [HTTP/3] Disable test failing on bad Alt-Svc header #83876
    area-System.Net.Http
  • Ensure kmask registers are marked available #83927
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512
  • Fixed a typo in SpinLock.cs #83953
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution

Updated

  • [mono] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #83776
    area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.0
  • Unroll SequenceEqual(ref byte, ref byte, nuint) in JIT #83945
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Initial step for adding AssemblyBuilder.Save implementation #83554
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Extend mstat format with information that maps to dependency nodes #83578
    NO-MERGE, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Arm64: Implement VectorTableLookup/VectorTableLookupExtension intrinsinsic + Consecutive registers support #80297
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Add assert.xunit subtree and make it AOT-safe #83933
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure
  • [WIP] RefreshMemoryLimit #83707
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Generalize handling of commas in block morphing #83590
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimization on LinearScan::buildPhysRegRecords #83862
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • NativeAOT: Partially expand static initialization #83911
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Switch mono to use cmake-detected objcopy #83903
    area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • Add lowering for As*() and dependent methods. #83861
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Renable running Arm64 test cases in CI #83948
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reimplement DacStackReferenceWalker and DacHandleWalker #83836
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][jit] Fix the removal of relations added by basic blocks. #83943
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [workloads] Mark the windows runtime packs workload as abstract #83230
    area-Build-mono
  • Make WindowsServiceLifetime gracefully stop #83892
    area-System.ServiceProcess
  • Add additional close statuses in ManagedWebSocket #83827
    area-System.Net, community-contribution
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Check in shim typeforwards and remove the dependency on the underlying targeting packs #79147
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [EXPERIMENTAL] insertion of enabled MSBuild Server by default #81617
  • Refactor `Interop.LocalAlloc` #82450
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • More efficient executable allocator #83632
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Provide support for exposing .NET classes to COM through source generation #83755
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator, 8.0.0
  • [NO MERGE][wasm-threads] JSImport promises on background threads #83838
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Assign correct slots for open generic service descriptors during IEnumerable resolution #80410
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Populating JSON properties support #83669
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Use cinc instead of csel when possible #82031
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Cleanup unmaintainable parallel logic with workers #77993
    area-System.Threading.Tasks, community-contribution
  • Implement the STJ.UseReflectionDefault feature switch #83844
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Remove EOL Linux versions from runtime graph. #82223
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Proper type name parser for native AOT compiler #83657
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • EmptyHandle.MDStreamVersion returns -1 #83944
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • JIT: Seed stress modes by string hash #83771
    blocked, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] [MONO][MARSHAL] Initialize ilgen with a flag #83813
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.6
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • [RISC-V] coreclr-jit directory #82379
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [mono][jit] Emit a null check when storing to valuetype fields. #82663
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Change IsolatedStorageFile path for mobile #83380
    area-System.IO, os-android, os-ios
  • #78303 Add transformation ~v1 & v2 to VectorXxx.AndNot(v1, v2) #81993
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Adding support for Vector512 `Equals`, `EqualsAny`, `op_Equality`, and `op_Inequality`. #83470
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Improve XmlDictionaryWriter UTF8 encoding performance #73336
    area-Serialization, community-contribution
  • Smaller static constructor context #83937
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add the possibility replace a nuget source (force dotnet nuget add) #31461
  • A csproj project w/o any local .cs files can fail to load .editorconfig #31459

PullRequests

Created

  • Use latest dogfood version #31469
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.1 to 19.11.2 in /eng/dependabot #31464
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: 7.0.3xx
  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 19.11.1 to 19.11.2 in /eng/dependabot #31463
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, dependabot: main
  • Update off-by-default analyzers to account for rename #31460
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Merged

  • added e2e test for insertion to sdk #31470
    untriaged
  • Containers: added e2e containers tests for console app #31450
    Area-Containers
  • [Blazor] Enable custom icu loading #31446
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2145133 #31394
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [Blazor] Fix `publish --self-contained` for Blazor builds. #30700
    Area-AspNetCore
  • add --create-manifest-if-needed flag #31231
    Area-Tools
  • [ASP.NET Core] Updates the license headers for Razor files #20699
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Split WebAssembly SDK from Blazor SDK #31154
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Add support for new output path format #31454
    untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #31442
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload fails with "ENC1002: The given key <assembly> was not present in the dictionary." #67497
  • release/dev17.6 builds are failing an assert in Bootstrap build #67495
  • Invalid IL produced for an always-throwing filter expression #67494
  • No ref safety error reported for switch expression with locals used in switch statement or foreach statement expression #67493
  • Extract Method "continue anyway" does not work #67488

Closed

  • Multiple features not working: Process Telemetry, Diagnostics Analyzer and Solution Events are not available. #67490
    17.6 P3
  • `SyntaxEditor` cannot change nested nodes properly #67499
  • Double click Inline parameter doesn't handle reserved keyword properly #66817
    17.6

PullRequests

Created

  • Display inheritance margin's content of menu item in TextBlock #67506
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage
  • Remove code for 'push' diagnostic tagging #67505
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Reorder workspace parameter for clarity #67504
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Add razor compiler EA assembly to VSIX #67501
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Issue with VBCSCompiler directory on linux #67489
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.7
  • Use GetResult(out Exception) method for awaits #67487
    Area-Compilers, PR For Personal Review Only, untriaged, Backlog

Merged

  • Pass through document open/close information to the workspace in LSP scenarios. #67498
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Limit walk during pragma directive analysis to subtrees containing directives #67491
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Include explicit BCL references for .NET 6 VS OOP #67503
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67500
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67502
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • [Infra] Fix 17.6 build #67496
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Add '@' prefix when inline hint value is a reserved keyword in C# #67484
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, Next
  • Document break for implicit locals of restricted type in async code #67466
    Area-Compilers, Documentation, Next
  • Trim away netframework targets in source-build #67384
    Area-Infrastructure, Community

Updated

  • Merge release/dev17.6 to release/dev17.6-vs-deps #67509
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Don't show expanded items in certain cases #67049
  • Merge release/dev17.6-vs-deps to main-vs-deps #67508
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge release/dev17.6 to main #67507
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Update ExtractInterface to use IRefactoringHelpersService #67482
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Interceptors #67432
    Area-Compilers
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2145186 #67418
  • All pull diagnostics changes. #62771
    Area-IDE
  • Remove roslyn implementation of error list #62741
    Area-IDE
  • Remove 'Push' diagnostics option #62735
    Area-IDE
  • Ignore private methods for awaitable types in IDE0051 #64688
    Area-Analyzers, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to release/dev17.6 #67078
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Generate branchless IL for `(b ? 1 : 0)` #67191
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix crash in `NullableWalker.LocalState.GetValue(int)` #67486
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Add net8.0 TFM to source-built packages #67333
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Don't look to the global.json when we're loading a binlog #67483
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Visit replacement expression before adding placeholder in RefSafetyAnalysis visitor #67155
    Area-Compilers
  • [Lightbulb Perf] Add support for prioritized diagnostic computation requests in OOP #67392
    Area-Analyzers
  • Annotate MS.CA and MS.CA.C# for trimming #66519
    Area-Compilers
  • Allow nested instance member access in `nameof` in static context #67461
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Decreasing the window size below the amount of data sent can prematurely abort the connection #47452
  • "Blazor Server with Auth=B2C" template sets policy requiring all request to be authorized. #47448
  • "Blazor Server with Auth=B2C" template not correctly populating Identity Options. #47447
  • Perf regression: json #47446
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #47445
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #47444
  • img decoding="async" with blazor #47449
  • Publish an announcement for the event name changes in logging #47436
    8.0-preview4
  • Incorrect results of RangeAttribute #47434
  • AspNetCoreModuleV2 should be able to restart executable if startup fails #47432
  • Perf regression: fortunes, fortunes_dapper #47431
  • IJSObjectReference module import path error #47430
  • dotnet new mvc with -rrc -f net7.0 can't work #47429

Closed

  • IBindFromHttpContext in analyzer message should be IBindableFromHttpContext #47409
    8.0-preview4
  • OutputCacheMiddleware argument null exception if policy sets AllowCacheLookup to false and AllowCacheStorage to true #46671
  • EmptyHttpResult is not straightforward to be used in type checking #45063
    7.0.x
  • RDG doesn't handle `Task.CompletedTask` return #47191
    8.0-preview4
  • Web Socket Always in Closed State #47289
  • HealthCheckPublisherError and HealthCheckPublisherTimeout have the same EventId.Id = 104 #47348
  • Decide if duplicate EventNames in LoggerMessage is appropriate #46072
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-preview.1.23107.4]SmartStore app some javascript function don't work after building and publishing with .net8 SDK #46692
  • SupplyParameterFromQuery doesn't work when name of parameter is the same as a type in the same class #47433
  • EnumTypeModelBinder does not handle enum flags correctly #10191
    Backlog
  • Problem with .NET 7 applications on Windows Server 2022 #46867
  • App without a default CORS policy doesn't apply custom CORS policies #47022
    .NET 8 Planning

PullRequests

Created

  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play (Redux) #47454
    area-runtime
  • Bump gson to 2.8.9. #47453
    area-signalr
  • Create Linux-Musl Redistributable Artifacts #47451
    area-infrastructure, needs-area-label, .NET 8.0
  • Use Json TypeInfoResolverChain #47450
    needs-area-label
  • Update SDK #47441
    area-infrastructure
  • Clean up unnecessary suppressions #47440
    area-blazor

Merged

  • Support populating cache without serving from it. #47392
    area-runtime, feature-middleware, feature-output-caching, 8.0-preview4
  • Fix misspelled type name in analyzer message #47443
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • Added a reminder for the breaking-change process #47412
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview4
  • [Web.JS] call mono_wasm_gc_lock in MonoHeapLock #46909
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Fallback using the `CultureInfo.Parent` instead of using hyphen #46637
    area-runtime, community-contribution, pr: pending author input, 8.0-preview4
  • Refactor HtmlRenderer layering #47404
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview4
  • Enable custom ICU loading. #47419
    area-blazor, Team:Runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Fixed duplicate LoggerMessage EventNames in RemoteJSRuntime.cs file #47280
    area-blazor, community-contribution, 8.0-preview4
  • Migrate some tests and fix fallback for empty optional bodies #47377
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • Move Returns400IfNoMatchingRouteValueForRequiredParam test case to shared RDG/RDF test infra. #47360
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview4
  • EnumTypeModelBinder does not handle enum flags provided as a list #46049
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, 8.0-preview4

Updated

  • Introduce per-HealthCheckRegistration parameters #42646
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • Improve IFormCollection.Items documentation #44372
    area-runtime, pending-ci-rerun
  • Make TLS & QUIC Pay-for-Play #47209
    area-runtime
  • Improve endpoint metadata debugging #47163
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Hash routing to named element #47320
    area-blazor
  • Flow FullAssemblySigningSupported for source-build to repo tasks #47421
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • UseBlazorFrameworkFiles: add webcil mime type mapping #46244
    area-blazor, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fix unobserved JSDisconnectedException in NavigationManager #47356
    area-blazor
  • [release/8.0-preview3] [blazor] Configure mono runtime with startupMemoryCache and runtimeOptions #47400
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, blazor-wasm, 8.0-preview3

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Update Templates to Make Developing a Maui Blazor MacCatalyst app a Better Experience #14219
  • Custom controls using handlers in MAUI app targetting .net not working #14213
  • Unintended focus control occurs in NavigationPage. #14211
    Backlog

Closed

  • [Android] [Regression] NavigationPage.TitleView with ScrollView causes: (1) crashes, and (2) blank pages with stuck ToolbarItems #13185
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Pressing next into a ListView or TableView goes to last element #13176
    Backlog
  • Microsoft.Maui.Devices.Flashlight: Check if supported #13458
    Backlog
  • XAML: IsVisible #11454
    Backlog
  • Android version code incorrect when publishing release build apk #11139
    Backlog
  • Android local pdf file path as source of webview is not displaying #14184
  • MSB4044: The "CompileAppManifest" task was not given a value for the required parameter "DefaultSdkVersion" #14189
  • Xamarin.Forms UWP CollectionView Memory leak #14194
  • When using SMS permission on Android ReceiveSms is always requested while it shouldn't #13446
    Backlog
  • FilePicker: Not possible to pick a file on an iPad-Pro Simulator with iOS 15.5 #9953
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • [android] update gradle from 7.0.2 to 7.2 #14221
  • [iOS] Update CollectionView layout when reloading data #14218
    area/collectionview 📃
  • Use Background as Fill, if Fill is null in Shapes #14216

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Find by primary key using named/typed parameters #30587
  • Cosmos DB null handling bug #30586
  • [EF CORE 7] Some FluentAPI instruction ignored when configuring Stored Procedure #30584
  • SQLNullValueException not raised on assignment of nullable column to value-type property #30583

Closed

  • LoadExtension SQLite #30522
  • Global query filters produce too many parameters #24476
    8.0.0
  • Generate compiled relational model #24896
    8.0.0
  • dotnet ef tools not allowing --output-dir #30582

PullRequests

Created

  • HierarchyId: Address API Review feedback #30588
  • Bump Microsoft.AspNetCore.OData from 8.0.12 to 8.1.0 #30585
    area-infrastructure, type-dependency update :arrow_up_small:

Merged

  • API review changes #30526
  • Don't duplicate query filter parameters #29422
  • Generate compiled relational model #30494

Updated

  • [release/7.x] Fixes around IncludeExpression for ExecuteUpdate/Delete (#30571) #30579
    Servicing-consider

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update SB prebuilts tarball version #15936
  • Update deployment-tools dependency #15935

Merged

  • Update SB prebuilts tarball version #15933

Updated
